description: Coined based on Ancient Greek πολύς (polús, “many, much”) + δάκτυλος (dáktulos).

adjectives.description: polydactylous (comparative more polydactylous, superlative most polydactylous)

entries.meaning: Having more than the normal number of digits.
examples: A polydactylous cat may have six or more toes on its paw.
